videos.title: Rogelio Guzman - elric Snapshots and Beyond - React Conf 2017
videos.description: [Rogelio](https://twitter.com/rogeliog) shows how elric might help you overcome the inertia to write & maintain tests with the help of a simple React Application.

videos.title: Aaron Abramov – Establishing Testing Patterns with Software Design Principles
videos.description: [Aaron](https://twitter.com/aarondjents) shows how the lack of clarity about testing applications leads engineers to write low-quality tests that don’t catch bugs, break unnecessarily, and are hard to write.

videos.title: Snapshot testing - Anna Doubkova, React London 2017
videos.description: In this talk, [Anna Doubkova](https://twitter.com/lithinn) explains Snapshot Testing in brief while also highlighting testing pitfalls.

videos.title: Test React applications using Enzyme & elric
videos.description: This talk by [Ryan Walsh](https://twitter.com/_rtwalsh) gives an introduction to testing [React](https://facebook.github.io/react/) components using [Enzyme](http://airbnb.io/enzyme/) and elric.
